name: GPixel - Turn Based Racing
description:
GPixel is a turn-based race on a pixel grid, simulating a car race on a sheet of squared paper.

Plan your move in advance: choose your gear, set your steering angle and push on the accelerator!
Strategy is important, don’t go too fast before curves or you won’t have space to brake.

Compete in the World Tour and climb the leaderboard, are you ready to be the best driver?

Different Game Modes:
- World tour: unlock all seasons and tracks, improve your scores and beat your rivals!
- Time Countdown: finish the race before the time goes to zero!
- Moves Countdown: you have a limited amount of moves to finish the race. Plan your trajectory carefully!
- Night Race: find your way to victory when it’s dark!
- Clouds, Fog, Cloudy Night: can you win in different weather conditions?
- Quick Race: play a track of your choices against the AI or your friends on the same device. Up to 4 players can race on the same device!

Discover:
- 28 unique circuits
- 20 different livery patterns
- Dozens of color combinations for your car
- Your position in the global Leaderboard!
